targets.query:
from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytotal")
  |> last()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytoday")
  |> last()
  |> group()

solar = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter","_measurement","_field"])
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "solar"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with pivot: 1 }))

house = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "house_phase0" or r["device"] == "house_phase1" or r["device"] == "house_phase2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["device","_measurement","_field"])  
  |> sum()
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "house"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with pivot: 1 })) 

join(tables: {solar:solar,house:house}, on: ["pivot"])

//  |> pivot(rowKey:["pivot"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalworktime")
  |> last()
  |> group()

billed = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "meterreadings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["billing"] == "yes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "offpeak" or r["_field"] == "peak_generated" or r["_field"] == "peak_used")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","billing","_measurement"])

current = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "meterreadings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["billing"] == "no")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "offpeak" or r["_field"] == "peak_generated" or r["_field"] == "peak_used")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","billing","_measurement"])

join(tables: {billed: billed, current: current}, on: ["type"])
  |>  map(fn: (r) => ({ r with balance: -(r.peak_used_current-r.peak_used_billed)+(r.peak_generated_current-r.peak_generated_billed) }))

billed = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "meterreadings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["billing"] == "yes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "offpeak" or r["_field"] == "peak_generated" or r["_field"] == "peak_used")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","billing","_measurement"])

current = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "meterreadings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["billing"] == "no")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "offpeak" or r["_field"] == "peak_generated" or r["_field"] == "peak_used")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","billing","_measurement"])

meterreadings = join(tables: {billed: billed, current: current}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with balance: -(r.peak_used_current-r.peak_used_billed)+(r.peak_generated_current-r.peak_generated_billed) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with join: 1 }))

// Get the time for the last meter reading
current_time = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "meterreadings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["billing"] == "no")
  |> last()
  |> tableFind(fn: (key) => key._field == "offpeak")
  |> getRecord(idx: 0)

// Get the usage from Shelly before the meter reading
old_usage = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -2y, stop:current_time._time)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "house_phase0" or r["device"] == "house_phase1" or r["device"] == "house_phase2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "total_returned")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_measurement"], columnKey: ["device", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

// Get the latest usage from Shelly
current_usage = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: -1w)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "house_phase0" or r["device"] == "house_phase1" or r["device"] == "house_phase2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "total_returned")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_measurement"], columnKey: ["device", "_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

// Combine the tables containing the Shelly readings and calculate the combined difference
shelly = join(tables: {old_usage: old_usage, current_usage: current_usage}, on: ["_measurement"])
  |>  map(fn: (r) => ({ r with shelly_usage: (-(r.house_phase0_total_current_usage-r.house_phase0_total_old_usage)-
    (r.house_phase1_total_current_usage-r.house_phase1_total_old_usage)-
    (r.house_phase2_total_current_usage-r.house_phase2_total_old_usage)+
    (r.house_phase0_total_returned_current_usage-r.house_phase0_total_returned_old_usage)+
    (r.house_phase1_total_returned_current_usage-r.house_phase1_total_returned_old_usage)+
    (r.house_phase2_total_returned_current_usage-r.house_phase2_total_returned_old_usage)
    )/1000.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with join: 1 }))

join(tables: {meterreadings : meterreadings , shelly: shelly}, on: ["join"])
  |>  map(fn: (r) => ({ r with balance_est: r.shelly_usage+r.balance}))
  |> keep(columns: ["balance_est"])

starttime = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> group()
  |> first()
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> tableFind(fn: (key) => key._field == "outputpower")
  |> getRecord(idx: 0)

endtime = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_measurement"], mode:"by")
  |> tableFind(fn: (key) => key._field == "outputpower")
  |> getRecord(idx: 0)

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: starttime._time, stop: endtime._time)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "deratingmode_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "faultcode_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytoday")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytotal")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalworktime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "deratingmode_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "faultcode_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytoday")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytotal")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalworktime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "faultcode_text")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytoday")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energytotal")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalworktime")
  |> last()

garagedata = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "garage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)


smalldata = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "small")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

olddata = from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "solar")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["inverter"] == "old")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "outputpower")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

union(tables: [garagedata,smalldata,olddata])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_measurement"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["inverter"], valueColumn: "outputpower")
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with garage: if exists r.garage then r.garage else 0.0})) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with small: if exists r.small then r.small else 0.0}))  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with old: if exists r.old then r.old else 0.0}))   
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.garage+r.old+r.small}))
  |> drop(columns: ["garage","old","small"])

from(bucket: "nodered")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "house_phase0" or r["device"] == "house_phase1" or r["device"] == "house_phase2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy" or r["_field"] == "returned_energy")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.energy-r.returned_energy}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop","energy","returned_energy"])
